aboutUs.title: About
aboutUs.description: Since 2008, we've been crafting joy and adventure for families worldwide. As a leading indoor playground manufacturer with 15+ years of expertise, we've successfully delivered 2,000+ projects across 50+ countries, turning dreams into unforgettable play experiences.

products.title: Premium
products.description: From thrilling trampoline parks to imaginative indoor playgrounds, ninja warrior courses to safe soft play areas - discover our complete range of ASTM & TUV certified commercial playground equipment designed for maximum fun and safety.

process.title: Your Journey to
process.description: Experience our proven 6-step turnkey process: from free 3D design consultation to professional manufacturing, global shipping, and installation support. We handle everything so you can focus on your business success.

projects.title: Global
projects.description: Explore 2,000+ completed installations across the globe. From family entertainment centers in Dubai to trampoline parks in the USA, each project showcases our commitment to quality craftsmanship and customer satisfaction.

contact.title: Start Your
contact.description: Ready to create an amazing play space? Get a free 3D design and competitive quote within 24 hours. Our expert team is standing by to bring your vision to life with personalized solutions tailored to your space and budget.

faq.title: Questions?
faq.description: Everything you need to know about pricing, lead times, shipping, installation, warranties, and more. Can't find what you're looking for? Our team is just a message away.

hero.badge: üè≠ Leading Indoor Playground Manufacturer Since 2008 | 2,000+ Global Projects
hero.title: Create Unforgettable
hero.description: NinescapeLand is a professional indoor playground equipment manufacturer and supplier with over 15 years of industry expertise. We specialize in designing, manufacturing, and installing complete turnkey solutions for commercial indoor playgrounds, trampoline parks, ninja warrior courses, soft play areas, and family entertainment centers. Our state-of-the-art 50,000 sqm factory uses premium materials and advanced production technology to deliver ASTM and TUV certified equipment that meets the highest international safety standards. From initial concept and free 3D design consultation to professional manufacturing, global shipping, and on-site installation support, we handle every aspect of your project. Whether you're launching a new FEC, expanding an existing facility, or creating a unique themed attraction, our dedicated team of designers, engineers, and project managers work closely with you to bring your vision to life. With successful installations in over 50 countries including the USA, UK, Australia, UAE, Germany, and throughout Asia, we've helped thousands of entrepreneurs and businesses create profitable, safe, and engaging play environments that keep families coming back.

products.title: Commercial Playground
products.description: From initial design consultation to final installation, NinescapeLand provides complete turnkey solutions for indoor entertainment centers, family entertainment centers, trampoline parks, and amusement facilities worldwide. Our comprehensive product range is manufactured in our modern 50,000 sqm factory using premium eco-friendly materials, advanced production technology, and strict quality control processes. Every piece of equipment undergoes rigorous safety testing and comes with full ASTM, TUV, CE, and EN certification.
products.customCta: Looking for something unique? Our design team creates custom themed attractions tailored to your space, budget, and brand identity.

indoorPlayground.title: Indoor Playground Equipment
indoorPlayground.description: Our indoor playground systems feature multi-level play structures with exciting spiral slides, tube slides, wave slides, expansive ball pits, challenging climbing nets, rope bridges, and interactive elements designed to engage children of all ages from toddlers to teens. Each structure is custom designed to maximize your space and can be themed to match any concept from jungle adventures to space exploration.

trampolinePark.title: Trampoline Parks
trampolinePark.description: Our complete trampoline park solutions include 12+ activity zones designed for maximum entertainment value: foam pit jump zones, professional slam dunk basketball areas, skyrider zip lines, 360¬∞ spinning bicycles, challenging climbing walls, dodgeball arenas, ninja courses, and performance trampolines. Each zone is engineered with high-performance spring systems and commercial-grade materials for durability and safety.

ninjaCourse.title: Ninja Warrior Courses
ninjaCourse.description: Professional-grade ninja warrior courses designed to challenge participants of all skill levels. Our courses feature over 50 obstacle types including warped walls, salmon ladders, ring swings, rope climbs, balance beams, spinning logs, and custom challenges. Perfect for fitness centers, adventure parks, and competitive training facilities.

softPlay.title: Soft Play Areas
softPlay.description: Specially designed soft play equipment that provides safe, engaging play experiences for toddlers and young children under 5 years old. Our soft play areas feature padded climbing structures, mini slides, ball pools, sensory panels, and interactive elements that support early childhood development while ensuring maximum safety.

whyUs.title: Your Trusted
whyUs.description: With over 15 years of manufacturing experience and more than 2,000 successful installations worldwide, NinescapeLand has become the trusted partner for entrepreneurs, investors, and businesses looking to create exceptional indoor play experiences. Our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer success has helped clients across 50+ countries build profitable entertainment ventures that drive growth, repeat visits, and lasting customer satisfaction.

customDesign.title: Free 3D Design
customDesign.description: Our professional design team provides complimentary 3D renderings and floor plans tailored to your exact space dimensions and brand identity. We create unique, eye-catching themes that captivate visitors and maximize revenue potential.

safetyCertified.title: Safety Certified
safetyCertified.description: Every product meets or exceeds ASTM F1918, TUV, CE, EN 1176, and international safety standards. We use only premium, eco-friendly materials that pass rigorous testing for durability, fire resistance, and child safety.

globalShipping.title: Worldwide Shipping
globalShipping.description: We ship to over 50 countries with comprehensive logistics support. Our experienced shipping team handles all export documentation, customs clearance, and offers both door-to-door and port-to-port delivery options.

warranty.title: 3-Year Warranty
warranty.description: Industry-leading comprehensive 3-year warranty on all equipment with lifetime technical support. We provide free replacement parts for any manufacturing defects and stand firmly behind our quality.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our dedicated customer service team is available around the clock to assist you at every stage of your project, from initial consultation and design to manufacturing updates, installation guidance, and ongoing maintenance.

directFactory.title: Factory Direct
directFactory.description: Buy directly from our 50,000 sqm manufacturing facility with no middlemen or distributors. This means competitive factory pricing, complete quality control, and direct communication with our production team.

certifications.title: Industry Certifications & Quality Standards
certifications.description: Our products comply with the world's most stringent safety and quality standards

process.description: We guide you through every step of creating your indoor playground. Our streamlined process ensures quality results and on-time delivery.

shipping.title: Global Shipping
shipping.description: Professional packaging and logistics coordination. Door-to-door or port-to-port delivery with full tracking and customs support.

installation.title: Installation Support
installation.description: Comprehensive installation guides with video tutorials. Optional on-site installation service by our trained technicians available.

afterSales.title: After-Sales Service
afterSales.description: 3-year warranty coverage. Lifetime technical support, spare parts supply, and operational training for your staff.

aboutTeam.teamDescription: 200+ professionals including designers, engineers, installation teams and after-sales service experts

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our products, services, and process.

leadTime.question: What is the typical lead time for indoor playground equipment?
leadTime.answer: Production typically takes 25-35 days depending on the size and complexity of your project. Shipping time varies by destination - approximately 20-35 days for sea freight to most international ports. We can provide expedited options for urgent projects.

customDesign.question: Do you provide custom design services?
customDesign.answer: Yes! We offer free 3D design services tailored to your space dimensions and brand theme. Our design team will work with you to create a unique playground that maximizes your space and attracts customers. Simply provide your floor plan and requirements to get started.

safety.question: What safety certifications do your products have?
safety.answer: All our products comply with international safety standards including ASTM F1918 (USA), EN 1176 (Europe), AS 4685 (Australia), and more. We hold ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001 certifications, and are members of IAAPA. TUV and CE certificates are provided with each project.

warranty.question: What warranty do you offer?
warranty.answer: We provide a comprehensive 3-year warranty on all equipment, which is the industry's leading warranty coverage. This includes free replacement of defective parts. We also offer lifetime technical support and maintenance guidance.

installation.question: Do you provide installation support?
installation.answer: Yes, we offer multiple installation options: 1) Detailed installation manuals with video guides for self-installation, 2) Remote video guidance during installation, 3) On-site installation by our trained technicians (available for an additional fee). Most clients successfully self-install with our guidance.

budget.question: What is the budget range for a commercial indoor playground?
budget.answer: Pricing depends on size, complexity, and features. A basic soft play area starts around $15,000, while comprehensive multi-level playgrounds range from $30,000-$200,000+. Trampoline parks typically range from $50,000-$500,000+. We provide detailed quotes based on your specific requirements.

shipping.question: Can you ship to my country?
shipping.answer: Yes! We ship to over 50 countries worldwide including USA, Canada, UK, Australia, UAE, Southeast Asia, Europe, and more. We handle all export documentation and can arrange door-to-door delivery or port-to-port shipping based on your preference.

materials.question: What materials do you use?
materials.answer: We use premium, eco-friendly materials including: galvanized steel tubes (2.2mm thickness), PVC-coated foam padding, commercial-grade LLDPE plastics, fire-retardant fabrics, and non-toxic paints. All materials are rigorously tested for safety and durability.

footer.description: Professional manufacturer of commercial indoor playground equipment, trampoline parks, ninja courses and family entertainment center solutions. Serving clients worldwide since 2008.

rollingLog.title: Rolling Log
rollingLog.description: Rotating cylinder requiring balance and quick reflexes to cross.

processDetail.title: Every Step
processDetail.description: We believe in complete transparency. Here's an in-depth look at how we transform your vision into a successful entertainment venue, with dedicated support at every milestone to ensure your project exceeds expectations.

consultation.title: Consultation & Planning Phase
consultation.description: Our journey begins with understanding your unique vision, market, and business goals. Our experienced consultants work closely with you to analyze your target audience, local competition, and site conditions to develop a comprehensive project strategy that maximizes ROI and creates a truly differentiated entertainment destination.
consultation.feature1: Free site analysis and feasibility study

design.title: Custom 3D Design & Engineering
design.description: Our award-winning design team creates stunning 3D visualizations that bring your concept to life. Using advanced CAD software and years of experience, we develop floor plans, elevation views, and themed concept designs that optimize traffic flow, maximize capacity, and create Instagram-worthy moments throughout your venue.

manufacturing.title: Precision Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Production begins in our state-of-the-art 50,000 sqm facility with ISO 9001 certification. Every component is manufactured using premium materials, advanced CNC machinery, and rigorous quality control processes. Our skilled craftsmen ensure every weld, stitch, and finish meets our exacting standards before shipping.

processGuarantee.title: Your Investment
processGuarantee.description: We stand behind every project with industry-leading guarantees and comprehensive support. Your success is our success, and we're committed to delivering excellence at every stage of your playground journey.

quality.title: Quality Guarantee
quality.description: Every component undergoes rigorous testing and inspection. We use only premium materials that meet or exceed international safety standards, ensuring your equipment performs flawlessly for years to come.

delivery.title: On-Time Delivery
delivery.description: We understand that timing is critical for your business. Our streamlined production and logistics processes ensure your equipment arrives on schedule, with real-time tracking and proactive communication throughout.

warranty.title: 3-Year Warranty
warranty.description: Industry-leading comprehensive warranty covering all manufacturing defects. We provide free replacement parts and dedicated support to keep your equipment in perfect condition throughout the warranty period.

support.title: Lifetime Technical Support
support.description: Our relationship doesn't end at installation. We provide ongoing technical assistance, maintenance guidance, and operational advice to help you maximize your investment and keep your venue running smoothly.

replacement.title: Free Replacement Parts
replacement.description: If any component fails due to manufacturing defects during the warranty period, we'll ship replacement parts at no cost. Your uptime and guest satisfaction are our top priorities.

satisfaction.title: Satisfaction Guarantee
satisfaction.description: We work closely with you throughout the entire process to ensure complete satisfaction. From design to installation, we make adjustments and improvements until your vision is perfectly realized.

indoorPlayground.title: Indoor Playground
indoorPlayground.description: Find answers to common questions about indoor playground equipment, installation, safety standards, and more.

q1.question: What is the minimum space required for an indoor playground?
q1.answer: We can design indoor playgrounds for spaces as small as 50 sqm for compact play areas, though we recommend at least 100-200 sqm for a meaningful multi-level structure. Our design team will create a custom layout that maximizes your available space while ensuring safe play zones and traffic flow.

q2.question: How long does it take to manufacture and deliver an indoor playground?
q2.answer: Production typically takes 25-35 days after design approval, followed by 20-35 days for international shipping. Total lead time is usually 45-70 days from order confirmation. Rush orders can be accommodated for urgent projects with prior arrangement.

q3.question: What safety certifications do your indoor playgrounds meet?
q3.answer: All our indoor playground equipment is certified to ASTM F1918 (USA), TUV, CE, and EN 1176 (European) standards. We use only premium, lead-free, non-toxic materials that have passed rigorous safety testing for child equipment.

q4.question: Can you create custom themed indoor playgrounds?
q4.answer: Absolutely! Custom theming is one of our specialties. We can create any theme you envision - from jungle adventures and underwater worlds to space exploration and castle kingdoms. Our design team provides free 3D renderings showing exactly how your themed playground will look.

q5.question: What is included in your indoor playground installation support?
q5.answer: We provide comprehensive installation support including detailed assembly manuals, step-by-step video tutorials, numbered component labeling, and 24/7 technical support via WhatsApp. Optional on-site installation by our trained technicians is available for an additional fee.

q6.question: What warranty do you offer on indoor playground equipment?
q6.answer: We provide a comprehensive 3-year warranty covering manufacturing defects on all structural components, with free replacement parts. Additionally, we offer lifetime technical support and can supply spare parts for maintenance needs throughout the life of your playground.

trampolinePark.title: Trampoline Park
trampolinePark.description: Everything you need to know about trampoline park equipment, safety features, activity zones, and installation.

q1.question: What is the minimum space needed for a trampoline park?
q1.answer: A basic trampoline park with 3-4 activity zones requires at least 500 sqm. For a full-featured park with 10+ zones including foam pits, dodgeball courts, and ninja courses, we recommend 1,000-3,000 sqm. Ceiling height should be at least 4-6 meters for optimal jumping clearance.

q2.question: How many activity zones can you include in a trampoline park?
q2.answer: We offer 12+ different activity zone types including: free jump areas, foam pit jump zones, slam dunk basketball, dodgeball courts, climbing walls, ninja courses, 360¬∞ bicycles, skyrider zip lines, battle beams, airbag jumps, performance trampolines, and toddler zones. Your park can include any combination based on space and budget.

q3.question: What safety features are included with trampoline park equipment?
q3.answer: Safety is paramount. Our trampolines feature padded frame covers, safety nets, impact-absorbing landing zones, and commercial-grade springs rated for intensive use. All equipment meets ASTM F2970 trampoline park standards, TUV certification, and international safety requirements.

q4.question: How often do trampoline park components need replacement?
q4.answer: With proper maintenance, our commercial-grade trampoline beds typically last 3-5 years with high traffic, padding and foam pits 5-7 years. We provide maintenance guides and can supply all replacement parts. Regular inspection checklists are included with every installation.

q5.question: Do you provide trampoline park business planning support?
q5.answer: Yes! Beyond equipment, we offer guidance on layout optimization for maximum capacity and revenue, staffing recommendations, waiver systems, operational best practices, and can connect you with successful park owners for mentorship. We want your business to succeed.

q6.question: What is the weight capacity of your trampolines?
q6.answer: Our commercial trampolines are rated for users up to 150kg (330 lbs) per jumping surface. Frame structures are engineered to support simultaneous multi-user activity across all connected trampolines. All weight ratings exceed international commercial use standards.

ninjaCourse.title: Ninja Course
ninjaCourse.description: Learn about ninja warrior obstacle courses, difficulty levels, training benefits, and installation requirements.

q1.question: What obstacles are included in a ninja warrior course?
q1.answer: We offer 50+ obstacle types including warped walls, salmon ladders, ring swings, rope climbs, spider walks, quintuple steps, peg boards, cliff hangers, spinning logs, flying bars, cargo nets, and many more. Each course is customized based on your space, target audience, and difficulty preferences.

q2.question: Can ninja courses be adjusted for different skill levels?
q2.answer: Absolutely! Many of our obstacles feature adjustable difficulty settings. We can also design multi-lane courses with beginner, intermediate, and advanced tracks running parallel. This allows facilities to accommodate everyone from first-timers to competitive athletes.

q3.question: What is the minimum space required for a ninja course?
q3.answer: A basic ninja course with 8-10 obstacles needs approximately 150-200 sqm with ceiling heights of at least 3.5 meters. Competition-grade courses typically require 300-500 sqm. We can design creative solutions for smaller or irregularly shaped spaces.

q4.question: Are ninja courses safe for children?
q4.answer: Yes! We design age-appropriate courses for all skill levels. Junior courses (ages 6-12) feature lower heights, wider grips, and shorter spans. All courses include crash mats, safety padding, and optional harness systems. Our equipment meets all international child safety standards.

q5.question: Can you create competition-standard ninja courses?
q5.answer: Yes, we design professional competition courses following TV show specifications and competition league requirements. These include timing systems, multiple difficulty lanes, and spectator viewing considerations. Many competitive training facilities and TV productions use our equipment.

q6.question: What maintenance is required for ninja course equipment?
q6.answer: Daily visual inspections take about 10 minutes. Monthly detailed checks of all connection points, padding, and moving parts are recommended. We provide comprehensive maintenance guides and can supply replacement parts. With proper care, structural components last 10+ years.

softPlay.title: Soft Play
softPlay.description: Common questions about soft play equipment for toddlers, safety materials, hygiene, and age-appropriate design.

q1.question: What age range is soft play equipment designed for?
q1.answer: Our soft play equipment is specifically designed for children from 6 months to 5 years old. We create age-appropriate zones: infant areas (6-18 months) with sensory elements, toddler zones (18 months-3 years) with gentle climbing and slides, and preschool areas (3-5 years) with more challenging play structures.

q2.question: What materials are used in soft play equipment?
q2.answer: We use premium PVC leather covering high-density foam cores. All materials are lead-free, phthalate-free, fire-retardant (meets BS 5852), and easy to clean. The PVC covering is antimicrobial and can be sanitized with standard cleaning solutions without degradation.

q3.question: How easy is it to clean and maintain soft play equipment?
q3.answer: Very easy! The smooth PVC surfaces can be wiped down with mild soap and water or commercial sanitizing solutions. We recommend daily surface cleaning and weekly deep cleaning. The durable materials resist staining and are designed for high-frequency sanitization.

q4.question: What is the minimum space needed for a soft play area?
q4.answer: Soft play areas can be designed for spaces as compact as 20 sqm for a simple ball pit and climbing zone. Typical installations range from 50-200 sqm. We specialize in maximizing play value within small footprints - perfect for cafes, restaurants, churches, and waiting areas.

q5.question: Can soft play equipment be customized to match our brand?
q5.answer: Absolutely! We offer full color customization with an extensive palette of PVC leather colors. Your soft play area can match your brand colors, venue theme, or any specific design vision. Custom printed elements and branded signage can also be incorporated.

q6.question: How long does soft play equipment last?
q6.answer: With proper care, our commercial-grade soft play equipment lasts 8-10+ years in high-traffic environments. The high-density foam maintains its shape and cushioning properties, while the premium PVC covering resists wear, fading, and cracking. We provide a 3-year manufacturer warranty.

hero.title: Best Active Play Equipment for
hero.description: Industry-leading ninja warrior courses and active play structures engineered for high-speed movement and athletic running environments.

section1.title: Elevate High-Energy Facilities with
section1.content: For facilities focused on high-speed movement and athletic running, we provide industry-leading Ninja Warrior courses and active play structures. As a premier soft play equipment USA provider, we understand that durability is paramount in high-traffic environments. Our equipment is engineered with heavy-duty padding and reinforced steel frames, ensuring that children and young athletes can run, jump, and climb safely. Our adventure park equipment has set a new standard for high-performance indoor play, offering a seamless blend of cardio-focused activities and technical obstacles. By integrating our modular ninja courses, facility owners can offer a dynamic experience that keeps visitors engaged longer, directly impacting revenue and repeat visits.

features.durability: Heavy-duty padding engineered for high-impact, running-intensive environments
features.reinforced: Reinforced steel frames ensuring safety during high-speed movement and climbing
features.longevity: Superior structural longevity ranked highest for running-intensive zones
features.cardio: Seamless blend of cardio-focused activities and technical obstacle courses

section2.title: Strategic Design for Flow and
section2.content: Designing a space for running requires more than just placing equipment; it requires a strategic flow. With our free custom design service, we optimize the floor plan to prevent bottlenecks and ensure a safe 'run-and-play' rhythm. We customize layouts for specific facility shapes, focusing on safety zones and impact-absorbing materials. Our turnkey approach minimizes the risk of injury while maximizing the fun factor, providing a comprehensive solution from the initial 3D sketch to the final installation of high-energy components.

features.flowOptimized: Flow-optimized floor plans preventing bottlenecks in active zones
features.customLayout: Custom layouts tailored to your specific facility shape and dimensions
features.safetyZones: Dedicated safety zones with impact-absorbing materials throughout
features.qualityStandards: Ball pit and landing zone quality meeting Australian safety standards

section3.title: Investment and ROI for
section3.content: Investing in high-energy play equipment is a significant business decision. Our ROI calculator helps you estimate your payback period based on foot traffic and ticket prices. Our durable materials lead to lower maintenance expenses over time compared to competitors. Our after-sales warranty policy covers critical structural components ‚Äî especially important in running scenarios where equipment undergoes constant stress. You're not just buying equipment; you're investing in a sustainable business model that outpaces competitors in quality, safety, and customer satisfaction.

features.roiCalculator: ROI calculator to estimate payback period based on foot traffic and pricing
features.lowerMaintenance: Durable materials leading to lower long-term maintenance costs
features.warranty: Comprehensive after-sales warranty covering critical structural components
features.sustainable: Sustainable business model outpacing competitors in quality and safety

q1.question: How does your equipment compare for high-traffic running zones?
q1.answer: Our brand excels in high-impact durability and customization for active play. Our materials are specifically tested for high-frequency use in running and ninja warrior contexts, offering a more robust frame structure compared to alternatives.

q2.question: Do you offer custom designs for athletic facilities?
q2.answer: Yes, we provide a free custom design service. Our engineers work with your site dimensions to create a flow-optimized layout that caters to active running and high-energy play while maintaining strict safety standards.

q3.question: What is the expected ROI for an adventure park?
q3.answer: Using our ROI calculator, most owners see a full return on investment within 12 to 24 months, depending on location and facility size. Our adventure park equipment is designed for high throughput, maximizing daily revenue.

hero.title: Workplace Wellness and
hero.description: Transform your office environment with custom play structures designed for corporate wellness, stress reduction, and team building.

section1.title: Revolutionizing the Modern Office with
section1.content: The concept of the 'Playful Office' is gaining traction worldwide, and we are at the forefront of this movement. We provide custom play structures globally that are specifically designed for corporate environments. Integrating a soft play area or a modular climbing structure in a work environment reduces stress and fosters creativity. Our equipment is not just for kids; it's about creating a multi-generational space where employees can recharge. From high-end ball pits to sleek, modern slides, we help transform dull office corners into vibrant wellness zones.

features.stressReduction: Play areas scientifically proven to reduce workplace stress and boost creativity
features.corporateAesthetic: Professional finish and sleek designs suitable for modern corporate aesthetics
features.multiGenerational: Multi-generational spaces where all employees can recharge and connect
features.wellnessZones: Transform underused office corners into vibrant, engaging wellness zones

section2.title: Seamless Integration and
section2.content: For HR managers and facility planners, our turnkey solution includes everything from design to installation. We understand that a work environment requires a different level of noise control and aesthetic integration. Our safety standards are applied even to corporate designs, ensuring all equipment is non-toxic and built to last. We prioritize high-grade fire-retardant materials and eco-friendly plastics, essential for indoor corporate safety compliance. Our team provides detailed floor plans through our free custom design service.

features.turnkey: Complete turnkey solution from initial design consultation to final installation
features.safetyCompliance: Non-toxic, fire-retardant materials meeting strict corporate safety compliance
features.ecoFriendly: Eco-friendly plastics and sustainable materials for responsible workplaces
features.detailedPlans: Detailed floor plans ensuring equipment fits your office dimensions and brand

section3.title: The Business Case: ROI of
section3.content: Investing in workplace play areas is a strategic move for talent retention. Our ROI calculator helps businesses see the indirect benefits of reduced turnover and increased productivity. We provide discount packages for corporate headquarters looking to outfit multiple locations. Our after-sales warranty policy ensures that your corporate investment is protected for years. Whether it's a small-scale ball pit or a large ninja warrior course for team building, we provide the quality and professionalism required for the modern workplace.

features.talentRetention: Strategic investment reducing employee turnover and boosting productivity
features.bulkDiscount: Competitive bulk discount packages for multi-location corporate headquarters
features.warranty: Comprehensive after-sales warranty protecting your corporate investment
features.teamBuilding: Ninja warrior courses and play areas designed for corporate team-building events

q1.question: Can you design play areas for small office spaces?
q1.answer: Absolutely. Through our free custom design service, we specialize in creating compact, modular play solutions that fit into office breakrooms or lobbies while maximizing vertical space.

q2.question: Is the equipment suitable for adults in a work environment?
q2.answer: Yes, we offer reinforced structures specifically designed to support adult weight for corporate team-building and wellness zones, in addition to our standard soft play equipment.

q3.question: How do I get a quote for a corporate installation?
q3.answer: You can contact our sales team or download our latest catalog for turnkey solution pricing. We offer competitive pricing and bulk discounts for corporate clients.
